writer.name: 罗曼·季洪米洛夫 Roman Tikhomirov

director.name: 罗曼·季洪米洛夫 Roman Tikhomirov

introduction: Television film-ballet of nine movie novels. Makhmud Esambayev, People's Artist of the Chechen-Ingush ASSR, Honored Artist of the RSFSR, performs solo dances.The Caucasian lezginka, the Mongolian dance"The Hunter and the Eagle", the Indian choreographic "Golden God", the Brazilian dance, the Uzbek dance, the Spanish dance, the dance of the peoples of Africa, the satirical scene "Automatic", dances dedicated to the heroic people of Cuba and the first Soviet astronaut.The ballet dancers of the State Academic Bolshoi Theater of the USSR, the dance group of the Pyatnitsky choir and the Chechen-Ingush dance ensemble take part in the film.
